review: If you have a laptop and want to stream video or other content to your TV and have no other method of getting it there, then this little plug in and the software from google will assist you in doing it, without a lot of technical setup or knowhow.  The only criteria is that your laptop (or whatever you are using, I use iPads and iPods as well) is connected to your in-home wifi and your TV has a USB port.This means that you can stream all of those things that your DVD/Blueray player can't without having to purchase something that costs a fortune.  This is a very economical method to stream.
